snippet: A federal judge from Alabama accused of hitting his wife in a room at the Ritz-Carlton in Atlanta can have a misdemeanor battery charge dismissed if he completes a program that includes domestic violence intervention.
abstract: Fulton County State Court Judge Stephanie Davis rules that federal Judge Mark Fuller of Alabama, accused of hitting his wife in a room at the Ritz-Carlton in Atlanta, can have a misdemeanor battery charge dismissed if he completes a program that includes domestic violence intervention.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge from Alabama accused of hitting his wife in a room at the Ritz-Carlton in Atlanta can have a misdemeanor battery charge dismissed if he completes a program that includes domestic violence intervention.

headline.main: Alabama: Judge Facing Battery Charge Has Chance for Dismissal of Case
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Judge Facing Battery Charge Has Chance for Dismissal of Case
